planet.name: OGLE-2013-BLG-0102L B
planet.description: OGLE-2013-BLG-0102 was a microlensing event observed towards the galactic bulge. The lens system is a low-mass binary consisting of a primary at the hydrogen-burning limit and a secondary at the deuterium-burning limit. Depending on the definitions used, the secondary may either be regarded as a giant planet or a low-mass brown dwarf.
